Random(int) - Static method in class jMEF.PMatrix

Random(int) - Static method in class jMEF.PVector
Generates of a random vector \f$ v = (x_1, x_2, \cdots )\f$ where each component is drawn uniformly in \f$ \mathcal{U}(0,1)\f$.

RandomDistribution(int) - Static method in class jMEF.PVectorMatrix
Generates a random vector-matrix \f$ (v,m) \f$ such as \f$ m \f$ is a positive definite matrix.
RandomPositiveDefinite(int) - Static method in class jMEF.PMatrix
Generates a random matrix \f$ m \f$ such as \f$ m \f$ is a positive definite matrix: Draw a lower triangular matrix \f$ L \f$ at random and then return \f$ LL^T\f$.
